message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm confident you'll find it a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1200000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $800000 for the product, which is the maximum I can afford. Let me know if you're interested in this offer.
